reviews.title: Best breadsticks in town!
reviews.content: These breadsticks were perfectly crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. The garlic butter was amazing.

reviews.title: Too salty for my taste
reviews.content: While the texture was good, I found these breadsticks to be overly salted. Could barely taste the herbs.

reviews.title: Decent but nothing special
reviews.content: Average breadsticks. Not bad, but I've had better at other restaurants. Would eat again if they were free.

reviews.title: Olive Garden vibes
reviews.content: Reminded me of classic Olive Garden breadsticks. Warm, buttery, and unlimited - what more could you want?

reviews.title: Stale and disappointing
reviews.content: These tasted like they were from yesterday. Hard and dry. Not worth the money at all.
